books.title: Shadows of Eternity
books.author: Aiko Tanaka
books.description: In feudal Japan, disgraced samurai Takeshi wanders as a ronin after being framed for his master's murder. When his former clan is threatened by a corrupt warlord seeking to overthrow the shogunate, Takeshi must choose between maintaining his exile or reclaiming his honor. Along his journey, he mentors a young orphan with hidden talents and reconnects with a mysterious woman who holds the key to clearing his name. As political intrigue unfolds and battles rage across the countryside, Takeshi discovers that true strength comes not from the sword, but from the code one lives by. His path to redemption will test every principle of bushido he once held sacred
